itunes:title: Episode 787​​​ - Lynyrd Skynyrd's Rickey Medlocke
title: Episode 787​​​ - Lynyrd Skynyrd's Rickey Medlocke
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Lynyrd Skynyrd lead guitarist Rickey Medlocke to talk about the glory days of rock-n-roll, if the 1960s or 1970s was the better musical decade, what it was like to be one of the biggest rock stars in the worl...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Lynyrd Skynyrd lead guitarist Rickey Medlocke to talk about the glory days of rock-n-roll, if the 1960s or 1970s was the better musical decade, what it was like to be one of the biggest rock stars in the world in the '70s, and who he thinks the greatest bands of all time are and why (Van Halen, The Beatles, Cream, and Jimmy Hendrix are some of his picks).
